title: Skarner need a buff
body: His mana costs are absurd and he cant even clear the jungle without going oom i mean even in S4 with spirit stone you still didnt use E to monsters because you will be oom now you need to not even use your shield or to spam Q!! His damage in S5 has gone down simple because no longer elder lizard that he was working with his Q and the jungle options are bad the only "good" is the {{item:3709}}! Skarner hit hard from the new jungle and he need some buffs!
